data.title: How to use subtitles, captions, or choose audio language
data.meta_description: To change your subtitles, captions, or audio language settings, start watching a TV show or movie and then press pause. At the top or bottom of the screen, select the Audio & Subtitles icon to see the available settings.
data.text:
3. At either the top or bottom of the screen, select Audio & Subtitles . On TVs, language options may appear at the bottom without the icon. You can choose from the languages shown or select Other to see all language options.

4. Make changes to your audio or subtitle selections.
